title: U.S. corporate income tax revenues and forecast 2000 to 2030
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Revenues in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 31.
In general Revenues in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year '08 and '09.
The highest Revenues in billion U.S. dollars, of value 406.0 was reached at Year '30
The lowest Revenues in billion U.S. dollars, of value 131.8 was reported at Year '03
